title: ESN Sensor Reading
description: Schema defining a sensor telemetry observation captured by a field node.

reading_id.description: Unique identifier for the sensor reading.

node_id.description: Identifier of the sentinel node where the reading was captured.

pm25_ug_m3.description: Fine particulate matter (PM2.5) concentration in micrograms per cubic metre.

no2_ppb.description: Nitrogen dioxide concentration in parts per billion.

captured_at.description: Timestamp when the sensor reading was recorded.
